amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude any Federal land a boundary of which is within 3,200 feet of a residence, school, or hospital.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barragan amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 219 (Roll no. 85).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A064) offered by Ms. Barragan.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Barragan amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 219 (Roll no. 85).
